thread.title: Arrow Episode 5.17 Trailer: Prometheus Tries to Break Oliver
thread.title_full: Arrow Episode 5.17 Trailer: Prometheus Tries to Break Oliver

author: Spencer Perry
title: Arrow Episode 5.17 Trailer: Prometheus Tries to Break Oliver
text:
SHARE Arrow Episode 5.17 Trailer: Prometheus tries to break Oliver 
The CW has released the first trailer for Arrow Episode 5.17, which sees Oliver in the hands of Prometheus and let’s just say he’s seen better days. Check it out in the player below! 
Titled “Kapiushon” and set to air March 22, the episode is officially described as follows: 
“Prometheus (Josh Segarra) goes to great lengths to break Oliver (Stephen Amell). Meanwhile, in the flashbacks, Anatoly (guest star David Nykl) becomes worried about Oliver’s increasingly violent tendencies, which come to a head in a brutal confrontation.” 
Kevin Tancharoen directed the episode, which was written by Brian Ford Sullivan & Emilio Ortega Aldrich. 
Arrow stars Stephen Amell as Oliver Queen, David Ramsey as John Diggle, Willa Holland as Thea Queen, Emily Bett Rickards as Felicity Smoak, John Barrowman as Malcom Merlyn, with Paul Blackthorne as Detective Lance. The series is executive produced by Greg Berlanti, Marc Guggenheim, Andrew Kreisberg and Sarah Schechter.
